component.name: openTerfaceQT

description.p: openTerfaceQT is a cross-platform application that supports both aarch64 and x86 architectures. It serves as a comprehensive control interface for openterface-Mini-KVM devices.
With openTerfaceQT, users can seamlessly manage and control various operating systems through the openterface-Mini-KVM hardware, including:

component.summary:
A software for control openterface-Mini-KVM, smart KVM console for controlling any headless device via HDMI and USB.
https://openterface.com/ AGPL-3.0
openterface-Mini-KVM kvm openterface open-source
